page.title: 03Coxheath Infants School
page.content:
Coxheath Infant School opened in September 1974 on the same campus as the existing Primary school. The Infant School has been built around a central square courtyard with classrooms forming two sides and the hall and kitchen area completing the square. Since opening, the school has had 15 members of staff, including the present staff and has at present (July 1985) 150 children on roll.
Depending on their date of birth, children would normally spend two years at the school before transferring to the Junior School.
